## icons.CommentIcon class

An icon which allows the user to add comment text to a block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CommentIcon extends Icon implements IHasBubble, ISerializable 
```
**Extends:** [Icon](./blockly.icons_namespace.icon_class.md)

**Implements:** [IHasBubble](./blockly.ihasbubble_interface.md)<!-- -->, [ISerializable](./blockly.iserializable_interface.md)
